name: IC Drip Token
description: ICDrip Token ($ICD) is the token of the IC Drip NFT project (Dripland) in the ICP ecosystem. This is seen as a version like " Loot NFT " of the ETH ecosystem. The creators of IC Drip have always wanted the community to create something based on IC Drip NFTs. Based on that ideal and the Defi, memecoin, shitcoin trend that is slowly emerging on the ICP ecosystem, we intend to create $ICD tokens and airdrops in part for the community!
